metadata.title: CVE-2021-47201 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: iavf:free q_vectors before queues in iavf_disable_vf iavf_free_queues() clearsadapter->num_active_queues, which iavf_free_q_vectors() relies on, so swapthe order of these two function calls in iavf_disable_vf(). This resolves apanic encountered when the interface is disabled and then later brought upagain after PF communication is restored.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
